mapper.select: select t.name, t.total, t.id agentId, t.addmoney, t.lendinmoney, t.lendoutmoney, (select ifnull(sum(d.reimmoney),0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail d,budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent m,budget_year_agent y where o.id = d.reimbursementid and d.reimflag = 1 and d.monthagentid = m.id and o.id <> #{bean.orderId} and m.yearagentid = y.id and y.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 2 and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid ) as bxmoney, (select ifnull(sum(d.reimmoney),0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail d,budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent m,budget_year_agent y where o.id = d.reimbursementid and d.reimflag = 1 and d.monthagentid = m.id and o.id <> #{bean.orderId} and m.yearagentid = y.id and y.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 1 and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid) as sdmoney, (select ifnull(sum(a.allocatedmoney),0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated a,budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent m,budget_year_agent y where o.id = a.reimbursementid and a.reimflag = 1 and a.monthagentid = m.id and o.id <> #{bean.orderId} and m.yearagentid = y.id and y.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 2 and o.yearid = t.yearid and a.unitid = t.unitid) as hbmoney, (select ifnull(sum(a.allocatedmoney),0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated a,budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent m,budget_year_agent y where o.id = a.reimbursementid and a.reimflag = 1 and a.monthagentid = m.id and o.id <> #{bean.orderId} and m.yearagentid = y.id and y.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 1 and o.yearid = t.yearid and a.unitid = t.unitid) as hbsdmoney from budget_year_agent t,budget_month_agent m where t.yearid = #{bean.yearId} and t.unitid = #{bean.unitId} and m.yearagentid = t.id and m.id in(${ids})
